summary: Completed comprehensive testing of DigiKawsay Phase 5 RunaFlow implementation. All backend Initiative and Ritual APIs are working correctly (96.5% success rate). Frontend RunaFlow and Rituals pages load properly with functional Kanban view, stats, create/edit dialogs, and navigation. ICE/RICE scoring calculations working correctly. Initiative management and ritual management features fully operational.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 404 when creating reidentification request with test pseudonym

design_issues.issue: Page titles in h1 show 'DigiKawsay' instead of specific page names
Modal overlay intercepting clicks on dialog buttons

passed_tests: All 5 RunaFlow Initiative APIs working correctly
POST /api/initiatives/ - Create Initiative with ICE/RICE scoring
GET /api/initiatives/campaign/{id} - List Campaign Initiatives
GET /api/initiatives/stats/{campaign_id} - Initiative Stats with metrics
PUT /api/initiatives/{id} - Update Initiative with status and scoring changes
GET /api/initiatives/{id} - Get Single Initiative details
All 5 RunaFlow Ritual APIs working correctly
POST /api/rituals/ - Create Ritual with scheduling
GET /api/rituals/ - List All Rituals
PUT /api/rituals/{id} - Update Ritual configuration
GET /api/rituals/{id} - Get Single Ritual details
DELETE /api/rituals/{id} - Delete Ritual cleanup
ICE scoring calculation (Impact × Confidence × Ease / 10)
RICE scoring calculation (Reach × Impact × Confidence / Effort)
Initiative stats API returning total, avg_score, completion_rate
RunaFlow page loads correctly at /roadmap route
Kanban view with 5 columns (Backlog, En Evaluación, Aprobada, En Progreso, Completada)
Stats cards showing initiative metrics (1 total, 33.6 avg score)
Tab switching between Kanban, Lista Priorizada, Contribuidores
Create Initiative dialog opens with scoring sliders
Rituals page loads correctly at /rituals route
Ritual type stats cards (Diarios, Semanales, Mensuales, Trimestrales)
Create Ritual dialog opens with type selection
Navigation links in sidebar working for admin users
Access control restricting RunaFlow to admin/facilitator/analyst/sponsor roles
Access control restricting Rituals to admin/facilitator roles
Admin login and authentication working
Navigation between RunaFlow and Rituals pages working

success_percentage.backend: 96.5% (83/86 tests passed - all Phase 5 APIs working)
success_percentage.frontend: 95% (RunaFlow and Rituals functionality working, minor UI title issue)
